data.name: The Messenger Soundtrack - Disc I: The Past [8-Bit]
data.detailed_description:
The Messenger Soundtrack - Disc I: The Past [8-Bit] by Rainbowdragoneyes

1.A Messenger Is Needed (Introduction)
2.Ninja’s Respite (Ninja Village)
3.Hills of Destiny (Autumn Hills)
4.Detritus Risen (Autumn Hills Boss)
5.Forgotten (Forlorn Temple)
6.Into The Depths (Catacombs)
7.Ruxxtin the Great
8.Bamboo Boogaloo (Bamboo Creek)
9.Harness The Winds (Howling Grotto)
10.Quillshroom’s Horrors (Quillshroom Marsh)
11. Turmoil & Treachery
12. Impossible Ascent (Searing Crags)
13. Colos & Suses
14. The Frozen Light (Glacial Peak)
15. The Time Gauntlet (Tower Of Time)
16. The Arcane Golem
17. Leap Of Faith
18. The Arcane Shoppe
19. A Home Amongst The Clouds (Cloud Ruins)
20. Find A Way (Dark Cave)
21. The Poisoned River (Riviére Turquoise)
22. The Bat Matriarch
23. Beneath The Tides (Sunken Shrine)
24. Fire & Earth (Elemental Skylands)
25. The Demon Army (Underworld)
26. The Corrupted Past
27. To Break The Curse (Music Box)
28. Phantom of Yore (Final Boss)
29. Convocation Of The Curse
